function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proximity of smart IEQ sensor nodes to each other in wide buildings may increase the risk of contagious diseases propagation.","Impact":"Unmitigated propagation of contagious diseases may lead to public health crises and mass outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures within the building, increase ventilation and air filtration, and enhance cleaning and sanitation protocols.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for occupancy monitoring, HVAC systems for ventilation control, UV-C air disinfection systems.","People":"Building occupants and visitors in wide buildings with deployed smart IEQ sensor nodes.","Owner":"Building management and facility maintenance teams."}]}
